Fractional-reserve #bitcoin suppresses #BTC's price. It offsets BTC's real-world scarcity by creating unbacked claims to BTC (ie, more paper claims to BTC than there are real BTC), causing BTC's price to drop, all else equal. We have entered the era of fractional-reserve bitcoin.

Replying to @JoelKatz @elima_iii and @_Kevin_Pham
Miners have no say over the rules of a particular network. All they can do is select which transactions to include and which chain to mine. They chase profits. If the markets don't value a particular chain it becomes unprofitable to mine it. How is this coercive?
